title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Mix pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Fry onions until golden, add tomato puree and spices.
Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and serve with rice.
